title: Wild Streak
description: Ashanti Jefferson is only committed to one thing; her career. She allows nothing to stand in the way of her success, not even love.Colt Erickson has never played by the rules. He’s a wealthy bad boy artist with a reputation for living life on the edge. When Colt returns to Chicago, it’s for one purpose; to get his life in order. Ashanti is unlike anyone he’s met in the industry, and it’s only taken Colt moments to get on her bad side. Sexy and suspenseful, Ashanti and Colt’s story unfolds as they are forced to work together for a gallery exhibit’s success. Everything they know about themselves and each other is about to be tested.Some things may be meant to be, but there is no road map to happiness. Will their hearts lead them to love or ruin?
author: Josie Grayson
